Package net.minestom.server.network.player

Class PlayerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minestom.server.network.player.PlayerConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FakePlayerConnection, PlayerSocketConnection
    public abstract class PlayerConnection
extends Object
    A PlayerConnection is an object needed for all created Player. It can be extended to create a new kind of player (NPC for instance).

      • sendPacket

        public void sendPacket​(@NotNull
                       @NotNull ServerPacket serverPacket)
        Serializes the packet and send it to the client.

        Also responsible for executing ConnectionManager.onPacketSend(ServerPacketConsumer) consumers.

        Parameters:
        serverPacket - the packet to send
        See Also:
        shouldSendPacket(ServerPacket)

      • sendPacket

        public abstract void sendPacket​(@NotNull
                                @NotNull ServerPacket serverPacket,
                                boolean skipTranslating)
        Serializes the packet and send it to the client, optionally skipping the translation phase.

        Also responsible for executing ConnectionManager.onPacketSend(ServerPacketConsumer) consumers.

        Parameters:
        serverPacket - the packet to send
        See Also:
        shouldSendPacket(ServerPacket)

public @Nullable String getServerAddress()
